title: The Best of Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, Chris Mannix joins us to recap Game 1of the NBA Finals. Rams WR Cooper Kupp discusses his stellar season, and whether he expects Aaron Donald to be with the team next season. And Portland radio host John Canzano discusses the chances of Nike founder Phil Knight purchasing the Trail Blazers

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, Chris Mannix joins us to recap Game 1of the NBA Finals. Rams WR Cooper Kupp discusses his stellar season, and whether he expects Aaron Donald to be with the team next season. And Portland radio host John Canzano discusses the chances of Nike founder Phil Knight purchasing the Trail Blazers
